# math.ml

Advanced mathematical functions, functions on `Number`s


## Definitions

### Trig
```haskell
sin : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
cos : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
tan : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
pi : Number
```
### Misc.
```haskell
pow : Number -> Number -> Number
```
```haskell
round : Number -> Number -> Number
```
```haskell
ln : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
fac : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
exp : Number -> Number
```
```haskell
min : Number -> Number -> Number
```
```haskell
max : Number -> Number -> Number
```
### Predicates / Checking properties of numbers
```haskell
mod : Number -> Number -> Number
```
```haskell
divisible : Number -> Number -> Bool
```
```haskell
odd : Number -> Bool
```
```haskell
even : Number -> Bool
```
### Random
```haskell
noise : Vec -> Number
```
